medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Started approximately 1 day ago, migrated from periumbilical area to RLQ. Mild nausea, no vomiting. One episode of greenish diarrhea. No other symptoms. Denies fevers/chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Depression; Past surgical history includes laparoscopic repair and operative treatment for a right segmental tibia fracture with intramedullary nail.
